body_html: And BTW, so many steps before the fail bazel is able to link cudnn. I suppose TensorRT step is quite close to the end of the build, maybe about 60-70%. Unbelievable that cudnn linking wasn't needed until TensorRT step.
body_text: And BTW, so many steps before the fail bazel is able to link cudnn. I suppose TensorRT step is quite close to the end of the build, maybe about 60-70%. Unbelievable that cudnn linking wasn't needed until TensorRT step.
body: And BTW, so many steps before the fail `bazel` is able to link `cudnn`. I suppose `TensorRT` step is quite close to the end of the build, maybe about 60-70%. Unbelievable that `cudnn` linking wasn't needed until `TensorRT` step.
